release_notes: Ayah of the day now available as Notification in settings.
New Page Mode in Surah & Juz, Look for yellow page icon in the header!
Repeat Audio in page mode & verse sycnronization with audio
Swipe gesture in Mushaf and in Page Mode
Added Play Page Audio in Mushafs
release_notes.html: Known issue: This dialog may reappear on every app start. Please tap Close or Later button. Fix expected by Monday, 1 Dec. We apologize for the inconvenience.
